data.topic_title: "Does Social Media companies have a moral obligation to protect user's mental health?"

user_transcript_validation.followup_message: Your speech meets the requirements. Here's a brief summary of the transcript's content: Social media companies have a moral obligation to protect users' mental health due to the potential harm caused by excessive social media use. This obligation is rooted in the concept of social responsibility, which emphasizes the duty of companies to act in the best interests of society. By prioritizing user mental health, social media companies can promote a healthier online environment and mitigate the negative effects of social media on individuals and society as a whole.

structure.to_improve: Better transitions and stronger conclusion needed

user_transcript_evaluation.feedback:
I really love the clear thesis statement you've got in there - it sets the tone for a compelling argument.

One area for improvement is to work on smoother transitions between your ideas. You tend to jump abruptly from one point to another, and could benefit from some more cohesive connections.

Try rewriting the section that feels most disconnected to you, and focus on finding ways to link your ideas more explicitly.
